metadata.title: ulikunitz/xz: Infinite loop in readUvarint allows for denial of service (low)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in github.com/ulikunitz/xz. The function readUvarint may not terminate a loop what could lead to denial of service (DoS). 
            STATEMENT: In OpenShift Container Platform (OCP), OpenShift ServiceMesh (OSSM) and Red Hat Advanced Cluster Management for Kubernetes (RHACM) the affected components are behind OpenShift OAuth authentication, therefore the impact is low.
In OCP before 4.7 the buildah, skopeo and podman packages include vulnerable version of github.com/ulikunitz/xz, but these OCP releases are already in the Maintenance Phase of the support, hence affected components are marked as wontfix. This may be fixed in the future.

criterions.comment: buildah is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
podman is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
skopeo is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
